name: Buddha Bellies Cooking School Tokyo
description:
At Japanese Cooking School in Tokyo, you have a chance to learn how to make sushi, Bento Box, Okonomiyaki(Japanese pan cake) with us! All instructions and explanations are in English.

Our classes provide you an intimate, cozy and friendly atmosphere. Also, the kitchen is in the heart of Tokyo-easy access. Surely the experience of making sushi, bento, noodle etc. will give a certain spice to your cooking at home! This would be the best souvenir for you. We ensure memorable moments while you stay in Tokyo.
